Humanities Week returned from Oct PERIOD  to  with free online and inperson events around Virginia Techs campus PERIOD

Virginia Tech mens soccer fell to No PERIOD  North Carolina Wednesday night in the first round of the ACC tournament  a loss that puts the nail in the coffin on the Hokies season PERIOD

While most of spooky seasons special events have come to pass fall is far from over with plenty of fun festivities still in store for Hokies hoping to embrace all the season has to offer PERIOD Southwest Virginia hosts events and has natural beauty for students to enjoy with family friends or

Virginia Tech linebacker Tremaine Edmunds  and defensive end Trevon Hill  tackle East Carolinas Tyshon Dye  PERIOD The Hokies would cruise to a  victory Sept PERIOD   PERIOD

If there was someone you never want to see barreling toward you at full force its Virginia Tech linebacker Tremaine Edmunds PERIOD At sixfootfiveinches  pounds he is the reallife Man of Steel for Techs defensive unit PERIOD

Tremaine is the youngest of the three Edmunds brothers and has proved to be one of the most dynamic and effective players on the  team PERIOD Leading the defense in total tackles as well as forced fumbles and tackles for loss Edmunds makes for an unstoppable force in the ACC PERIOD His two forced fumbles tie him for the lead in the conference PERIOD

Hes a guy that does not miss a lot of plays in space said defensive coordinator Bud Foster on Tuesday PERIOD I think thats one of the things you see with a big athletic guy is he really can come under balance and come under control and make good open field plays. edmunds sheer size and physique as a linebacker is unparalleled in teams across the country PERIOD In a position that usually requires speed over size Edmunds is one of the few players that provides both making him a valuable asset to Fosters defense PERIOD

Virginia Tech quarterback Josh Jackson talked about Edmunds physical makeup and what makes him a special player PERIOD

Hes a great player hes fast hes big hes strong hes all you really want when it comes to a linebacker Jackson said PERIOD

K.C PERIOD Hinton  is aggressively tackled by Tremaine Edmunds  Sept PERIOD   PERIOD



His presence on the field commands respect from his opponents as he can cover the entire field PERIOD For the maroon and orange simply knowing that hes there is a reassurance PERIOD

Its amazing PERIOD I know that guy can cover a lot of ground so I know I dont have to be perfect all the time because that kid can play said defensive end Vinny Mihota PERIOD I think we all know that. edmunds has been under the radar these past two seasons not getting much recognition besides being the third Edmunds brother despite his powerful presence on the field PERIOD This  season has seen players and coaches around the country taking notice of him and rightfully so PERIOD

This past summer Edmunds was placed on three award watch lists the Bronco Nagurski Trophy the Butkus Award and the Bednarik Award which is presented annually to the defensive player of the year PERIOD Edmunds also earned secondteam AllACC last year for his impressive performance during the Hokies 10win season PERIOD

I think the nation knows how good he is PERIOD I think hes made a name for himself that hes one of the top dogs running back Steven Peoples said PERIOD

For Edmunds himself however it doesnt matter who knows him and who doesnt PERIOD If the nation knows how good he is hes not really concerned PERIOD

Im not even sure honestly I just try to do my part and play football Edmunds said PERIOD
